abstract: Criminals are luring targets into online sex chats, then persuading them to download apps that siphon off their contact information, passwords and address books.

headline.main: Hackers Use an Android App for Sex Extortion
headline.print_headline: Android App Used for Sex Blackmail

snippet: Criminals are luring targets into online sex chats, then persuading them to download apps that siphon off their contact information, passwords and address books.
